Text: I suppose this is one game where you shouldn't judge the 'book' by it's cover, cause I'll admit the cover might be the worst I've ever seen so far.

Just noticed something very... odd.

Orgy dens
Rating: Everyone.

I'm surprised that the standard to get an E is low. (Then again, it's not like we can go in them.)

Anyways, awesome upload. Been looking awhile for this, never thought to actually look on GOG.
